content: According to the latest forecast made by the China Auto Association, in 2022, the total car sales in China can reach 27 million units which would be 3% up over the same period of last year. We believe that for the later half of this year, the new car would gradually launch to the market in a steady way and especially for the second half of the year, there will be a series of very important auto shows and events will be held. Well, thank you for the question. Well, thank you for the question.
